name: Blacklist
description: Deny access based on internal and external IP/network/rDNS/ASN blacklists.

BLACKLIST_COMMUNITY_LISTS.help: Select community-maintained blacklists to include in blocking.
BLACKLIST_COMMUNITY_LISTS.label: Community Blacklists

multiselect.label: Laurent Minne's Data Shield Aggressive IPs

BLACKLIST_IP.help: List of IP/network, separated with spaces, to block.
BLACKLIST_IP.label: Blacklist IP/network

BLACKLIST_RDNS.help: List of reverse DNS suffixes, separated with spaces, to block.
BLACKLIST_RDNS.label: Blacklist reverse DNS

BLACKLIST_RDNS_GLOBAL.help: Only perform RDNS blacklist checks on global IP addresses.
BLACKLIST_RDNS_GLOBAL.label: Blacklist reverse DNS global IPs

BLACKLIST_ASN.help: List of ASN numbers, separated with spaces, to block.
BLACKLIST_ASN.label: Blacklist ASN

BLACKLIST_USER_AGENT.help: List of User-Agent (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to block.
BLACKLIST_USER_AGENT.label: Blacklist User-Agent

BLACKLIST_URI.help: List of URI (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to block.
BLACKLIST_URI.label: Blacklist URI

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_IP.help: List of IP/network, separated with spaces, to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_IP.label: Blacklist ignore IP/network

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_RDNS.help: List of reverse DNS suffixes, separated with spaces, to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_RDNS.label: Blacklist ignore reverse DNS

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_ASN.help: List of ASN numbers, separated with spaces, to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_ASN.label: Blacklist ignore ASN

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_USER_AGENT.help: List of User-Agent (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_USER_AGENT.label: Blacklist ignore User-Agent

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_URI.help: List of URI (PCRE regex), separated with spaces, to ignore in the blacklist.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_URI.label: Blacklist ignore URI

BLACKLIST_IP_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing bad IP/network to block. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
BLACKLIST_IP_URLS.label: Blacklist IP/network URLs

BLACKLIST_RDNS_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing reverse DNS suffixes to block. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
BLACKLIST_RDNS_URLS.label: Blacklist reverse DNS URLs

BLACKLIST_ASN_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing ASN to block. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
BLACKLIST_ASN_URLS.label: Blacklist ASN URLs

BLACKLIST_USER_AGENT_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing bad User-Agent to block. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
BLACKLIST_USER_AGENT_URLS.label: Blacklist User-Agent URLs

BLACKLIST_URI_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing bad URI to block. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
BLACKLIST_URI_URLS.label: Blacklist URI URLs

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_IP_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing IP/network to ignore in the blacklist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_IP_URLS.label: Blacklist ignore IP/network URLs

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_RDNS_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing reverse DNS suffixes to ignore in the blacklist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_RDNS_URLS.label: Blacklist ignore reverse DNS URLs

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_ASN_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing ASN to ignore in the blacklist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_ASN_URLS.label: Blacklist ignore ASN URLs

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_USER_AGENT_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing User-Agent to ignore in the blacklist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_USER_AGENT_URLS.label: Blacklist ignore User-Agent URLs

BLACKLIST_IGNORE_URI_URLS.help: List of URLs, separated with spaces, containing URI to ignore in the blacklist. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
BLACKLIST_IGNORE_URI_URLS.label: Blacklist ignore URI URLs
